title: Governor Announces Appointment (The Office of the Governor of the State of Illinois)
text: ( Source : The Office of the Governor of the State of Illinois ) SPRINGFIELD - Governor Bruce Rauner has appointed Michael Bigger to the Illinois Human Rights Commission . Bigger's participation in various civic endeavors will bring an
